title: Disconnect mid game and open the client back up and it is trying to update...won't move from 33%
body: was in the middle of a game and disconnected from the game, open the league client and it says it is calculating differences with 1 file scanned, 33% complete. Opened the client as administrator and still wasn't working. HELP ME

replies.body:
NA experienced a service issue yesterday that has since been resolved. This caused players to get stuck at 33% during the patching process. 

Let me know if you're still experiencing issues with this.
having the same problem... gonna keep restarting the client and see what happens
lol your screwed. priority que xD {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}}
I having the same problem as well
